title.rendered: Sania Mirza has proved ‘even after childbirth, a woman can have a big sports career’- Father Imran shares her motivations

content.rendered:
A day after the end of Sania Mirza’s top sky fly in Tennis world at her last Wimbledon where she missed a short step of getting chance for the Mixed Doubles career Grand Slam Final, her father Imran put her success in perspective,  “ We wanted to prove that even after baby birth a woman can go on to have broad sports career”. He told a newspaper that may she be one of the best athlete (after that). I think about the fact that she is still in top WTA’s Rank. She has proven it in her last year 23 touring.

Sania Mirza, the world’s top Indian tennis professional had performed brilliantly in her last Wimbledon championship. Mirza and her Crotian Partner Mate Pavic were a set and defending against American Desirae Krawczyk partnering with British Niel Skupsky in All England Club(AEC)’s court.

Indian Woman Tennis star and her partner, the two were reigning against opponent champion. The fight was on top excitement point, but with the plenty of home support for Skuspky got Mixed Doubles Grand Slam Ticket.

The 35-year-old Mirza is India’s most accomplished woman tennis player, having won six Grand Slam titles, including mixed double trophies. She wished to full stop her career in mixed doubles with Grand Slam Win, but it could not be fulfilled.

Sania has shown Globally the stamina of Indian woman during year of 2000 by her ever brilliant performance. Shania make a home about Tennis game among Indian woman. It was the time when it generally Called Tennis Mean Sania Mirza in India. Sania has awarded with ‘Padmashree’ (the one of most prestigious award given by Indian government.) in 2006 for her achievements. She became the youngest player of country honored by Padmashree.

Read Also: No place for Kohli, Pant, Jadeja? Zaheer Khan makes bold prediction for India XI in 2nd T20I vs England
